column3: Specs are BS， product is poorly made and designed
column4: I ordered an IFull m.2 enclosure drive for my NVMe drive. Drive rated 3k r/w， and when mounted internally performed as such. I previously purchased the manufacturer's enclosure and it only performed 1k r/w. I returned the enclosure. This drive said 10g r/w rating so when it was delivering slower than my other enclosure I was VERY disappointed. The two photos show the enclosures issues. The faster specs are my drive mounted internally， the slower setting are via this enclosure. Not great. Also isn't tool free， required using pliers to pull additional mounting screws. And， once you use the thermal paste and close this thing up， good luck ever opening it. Sucks， avoid this like the plague， must be a better one out there.

This is an interesting design， not my favourite but this clean and minimalist.The body is anodized aluminum and it is quality， it’s not cheesy like others. The inside side adapter is a plastic base and it too is precision made.When you plug it into your computer it works with ease basically ready to go with no fuse.It comes with a c to c port connector and a c port to a 2.0 USB port connector. Both are nice quality transfer cables I just wish they were longer by six inches .My favourite part is the thermal tape the unit comes with .This is a nice enclosure for your ssd. If you get this I don’t think you will be disappoint

column3: Useful tool for working with NVMe cards
column4: This is a very useful tool for working with NVMe cards. I got it so I could prepare an NVMe card for my new PC ahead of time before installing it in the system board's NVMe slot.Just one little issue: this device comes with two tiny black plastic doo-dads that are used to keep the NVMe card in place. With my NVMe cards I had to remove one of the two doo-dads otherwise it would have gotten in the way of the card. Then， when I removed the card to install it in my PC， the doo-dad slipped out of its slot and almost got lost. A word of advice: if you buy one of these devices， be very， very careful about these black plastic things lest you lose them. Without them the card won't stay in place so the device would be useless.

column3: Little adapter that makes my NVMe ssd portable
column4: From another project I have a NVMe ssd with M.2. interface available. With this adapter it's now a 1TB portable ssd drive that fits into my point very easily. The package even comes with foam that connects the NVMe to the metal enclosure which I suppose acts as a heat sink as well. Slide out， put the NVMe in and lock it with the locknut. No screw driver needed in the whole operation! It even comes with 2 data cables， USB C-C， USBC-A. I don't know what more one can ask for.

I looked at a lot of enclosures on Amazon and found mixed reviews. I decided on this one and it is working fine. One tip so you don't make this mistake I did， make sure your SSD drive is properly seated in the enclosure. When I first inserted my drive in the enclosure， it appeared seated properly and I was able to lock it in place with the thumb screw at the top of the SSD drive. I plugged the enclosure into my USB port and Windows recognized the enclosure， but did not see the drive. At first I thought the enclosure was defective， but then I thought I should try reseating the drive. While doing so， I noticed a very small portion of the SSD connector was visible before I reseated it， but after reseating it， the SSD connectors were not visible.

column3: WHAT TO DO WITH OLD M.2 SOLVED
column4: My old M.2 fit into place and then screwed down. USB cable plugged in and the computer recognized the drive. Simple， and it works.The screw is actually a key. It is small and fits one way the give a quarter turn. Hard to hold with fingers but easy with simple pliers.I am pleased with my purchase.

Works perfectly for me. This baby handles both M and B+M Key， and both NVMe and SATA. I had a SATA 500G M.2 that would not have worked on many of the similar items for sale (that don't support SATA). I am very pleased!All my critical files， legal， and financial backups are on a .5 TB drive I can easily slip into my pocket if there is an emergency - and are immune from main PC disk crashes...

Quick and easy setup， just pop it open insert the SSD close it and sync. I put in a 1T Samsung 970 Nand SSD and plugged it to my ps4， I had to format the drive but once it was done， It worked flawlessly.This device made it easy to upgrade my drive without having to open the receiving device and risking a warranty void.I am extremely happy with this! Must get if you have an extensive game collection or just simply need the space.

column3: Easy to use， good quality & inexpensive
column4: Just open drive with press of finger， add drive and thermal pad. Simple install takes minutes & worked right away on PC and consoles. The metal outside even with thermal pad gets pretty warm， after copying 100gb game， though should be fine playing games for hours. Feel like pretty good quality and am happy so far.

The adapter is designed with sturdy housing， this device is capable of fast data transfer and real line speed. With the appropriate connector， it is easier to adjust the connection between the two devices.

This enclosure was so good， I bought another one the next day. It's easy to open， but it stays shut when it's supposed to. Others I have tried would slide open too easily， when you didn't want them to. I use Linux and Windows， and this enclosure was recognized right away in both.The benchmark that I showed was through a USB3 hub， so the performances is definitely as expected.
I love this! I have been struggling to find an adapter that was actually going to protect the SSD card that I used. The plug in is quality and shows no sign of wear and tear from plugging in and out.
This is super nice with a dark-grey color to match my other adapters. Nice design and good quality.

I used it with NVME (WD Blue) and SATA (Samsung) SSDs. Both worked flawless.I gave the "Ease of Use" 4 stars， this is only because if you have fat fingers (like mine) it is not easy to twist the plastic button - but that is just a small inconvenience.The device is recognized and ready to use immediately under Windows and Linux.I was able to boot from attached SSD w/o any problem.
Added the m.2 and the pc recognize it as soon as I connected it and was all to clone my other m.2 without any issues.
Very good usb adapterToo bad my jetson nano arm64 kernel is too oldBut tested on x86 and works nicelyVery good customer service from seller

column3: Fancy and smooth adapter and perfect for mac and windows
column4: This has been a perfect selection for me and it works like a charm for my both laptops mac and windows. The speed is very good and can’t even recognize that it’s adapter or my laptop hard disk.It has a nice look and size is also small， you can carry everywhere and perfect if you are a traveller.Very happy with this product

column3: Used for cloning SSD to NVME， worked fine!
column4: Liked the "no screw" approach. Works as expected.
Used it on both SATA and NVMe M.2 2280 SSDs and it worked great. Very practical and well made device.
A very cool and sleek item that offers a great way to repurpose your solid state drives， highly recommend it!
Es de buena calidad， pero las instrucciones no indican cómo poner la pasta térmica， por otro lado funciona sin problemas.

column3: Quality enclosure at a low cost
column4: This tool-free enclosure is very easy to use and easy to swap out different NVME drives. It comes with USB-C to USB-C and also USB-C to USB-A cord so you can use this enclosure with newer USB-C ports on your device or older USB-A ports.
This works perfectly for me. Great that you don't need a screwdriver to add and remove drives. I had to return another enclosure because it was NVMe only--glad that this supports SATA as well.
Well built and no tool design . This enclosure worked fine for me
Very nice.

column3: Works great， needs more than a plastic nub
column4: The little plastic nub that holds the nvme drive broke but the thing over all works like a charm. Highly recommened.
I've used this for a couple days now and have not had any issues. Easy to install my drive. Just slide open and insert. It was easy to open， but still didn't feel loose or insecure.

column3: Metal casing， quality build， good Read/Write speed.
column4: Quality is very well built. Metal enclosure will keep the SSD cool. Will offer some protection from external force for your ssd.Read Write speed is fast.Worth the money getting. No regrets.
It’s simple and very easy to use. I bought it because I had an SSD laying around and thought I’d tried it and I like it honestly， simple and does what it needs to so
For the price I really can’t complain. Works great.
Works good. Comes with accessories as shown in these pictures
Very nice design， no driver， easy to use. Highly recommended.

My Samsung 980 EVO pro doesn’t fit properly so it is not recognized and I can’t initialize the drive. Don’t know what the raving reviews are about but this thing is cheap and doesn’t work. DO NOT BUY.

column3: Amazing little device. I found it very easy to use. Didn't even need to look at the instructions.
column4: This is a great product that is extremely is to use. It met my needs and every expection.
Excelente producto， vendedor recomendado
Very handy and useful to keep around

column3: Works just like it’s supposed to
column4: Would recommend this to anyone who has a use for it
Easy set up

column3: A fair priced， tool-less NVMe - SATA SSD Enclosure that delivers.
column4: The IFULL M.2 NVMe & SATA SSD Enclosure is low priced， considering that supports both NVMe PCIe and SATA M.2 SSDsThe IFULL M.2 NVMe & SATA SSD Enclosure has a simple tool-free design that works. Just push and slide to open it or close it and twist the little knob to secure the M.2 SSD. It could hold different sizes M.2 SSDs (2242， 2260 & 2280). No need to deal with those tiny SSDs screws that will eventually disappear when you must need them.If you work in a computer shop and you have to swap drives often， then you will be delighted by the simple and easy to use design. It takes seconds to get a M.2 install and running.This enclosure comes with both USB Type-C to Type-C and USB Type-C to Type-A cables and it is compatible with Windows， MacOS and Android systems.It works on several platforms， so it could help when cloning M.2 drives， backing up your data or even copying your smartphone pictures and files.The IFULLM.2 SSD Enclosure can reach high speeds with the right drive (NVMe) and the right standard (USB C 3.1 Gen 2)I was able to copy a 9.6GB video file in 5 seconds (8.5 Gbit/s) on NVMe connected to a USB 3.2 Gen2 port on a ASRock B550 motherboard. On SATA it reached write speeds of 498 MB/s.I used several systems with USB 3.0， 3.1 and 3.2 Gen2 on both Type A and Type C ports.Depending on the USB interface and the drive used， the transfer speed could vary significantly.The enclosure comes with thermal padding. I did not use it， since none of the drives went above 40°C even when transferring files.Drives used:SK Hynix Gold P31 M.2 PCIe NVMeIntel SSD Pro 2500 M.2 SATAMicron 1100 M.2 SATADevices used:MacBook Pro (2017)Dell Inspiron 13 7000Oneplus 7TSamsung Galaxy S10AMD Ryzen system with a ASRock B550 motherboard.

The obvious use is to make an enormous， really fast USB drive. And for that purpose it works great.I had a more specific use. I was doing some system upgrades. One part of the upgrade was to replace my PCIe 3 2 TB NVMe drive with a faster PCIe 4 2 TB drive. The drive was my boot drive. Before upgrading I installed my new PCIe 4 drive into this enclosure. Plugged it in and the system recognized it instantly. I then used some drive cloning software to clone my old drive to the new drive.The cloning process ran without issue. Removed my new drive from this enclosure. Swapped out my old drive for my new drive， and my system booted right up. Fast and easyIt was simple to install the drive into the enclosure. Also easy to remove it when I was done. This is a very handy device for system builders.

column3: Fast transfer rates and solid construction， great product， seller offers compensation for reviews
column4: I added a Samsung m2 drive in this recently to take along with me for recent trip so I could offload files from SD cards to this drive. The file transfers to the m2 drive with this enclosure were very fast and the included cables made for easy accessibility with many devices.Additionally， I like the machined， rounded， aluminum case that makes for easy packing amongst other equipment and helps with heat dissipation. I did not attach the included thermal strip to my m2 drive， which may have helped with heat dissipation as the case does get quite warm when in use.

column3: The best external M.2 enclosure I have ever owned
column4: I love the tool-free design of this thing. You simply hold down a "button" on the outside and slide to open it up， insert your drive， and turn a little plastic knob to hold the drive in place instead of those tiny screws. Slide the case back on and you're done! I used it in a USB 3.1 Gen 2 port on my motherboard and it is so fast， it feels as fast as the drive did when it was installed in my old computer. I couldn't have asked for a better enclosure. 5 stars all the way!

column3: Great way to make an M.2 super portable.
column4: It took me literally a minute or two to install my M.2 into this enclosure. Since then， I have had the ability to carry a high speed， high capacity drive around in my pocket， ready for use by simply plugging it into a USB3 or USB-C Thunderbolt port if one is available.It works great. A great price for such a useful tool. My drive is safe， cool and so easy to use. I am very happy with this enclosure. I give it 5 stars.

This adapter is well designed for placing the memory board.No issues placing a memory board inside or subsequently replacing it， except for a bit tricky part of securing the other part of the memory board by inserting and turning a tiny black plastic screw (there are two of them in the package). Other than that， it's a good enclosure.

column3: Fast transfer speeds in a sleek enclosure
column4: I needed a device that was portable， holds a lot of storage， and can securely back up my data. This enclosure was the perfect casing for my SSD. It was the perfect size to slip into my bag and the transfer speeds are pretty great， too!
Excellent product， consumer price friendly， and fast shipping. Many Thanks， Jim
Very well made， easy to use. Would recommend.
Easy to use and was fast delivered. Defintly would order it again
excelente cumple con lo requerido
easy to use.
Excelente de usar
